description: Twenty-five percent of the purchase price of this cotton jersey T-shirt helps benefit programs for cancer screenings, early treatment, research, and patient navigation. It's a stylish way to show your support for reducing disparities in cancer care and improving access to quality treatment for everyone at an earlier, more curable stage.
fitting_details: Custom Slim Fit: slightly fitted through the chest and the waist.
Size medium has a 28" body length (front and back), an 18" shoulder, and a 41" chest.
Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. "L," our signature Big Pony, and "VE" printed along the right sleeve.
"Pink Pony 20 Years" printed at the left chest. Signature Pony printed all over the back. "Ralph Lauren" script printed at the lower back.
Model is 6'1"/185 cm and wears a size medium.

Twenty-five percent of the purchase price of this item is directed to an international network of cancer charities. Within the US, proceeds benefit the Pink Pony Fund of the Ralph Lauren Corporate Foundation.
To learn more, please visit RalphLauren.com/PinkPony.
